answers.answer: Hi!I know you have undergone a battery of tests and since I cannot examine you or go through them in detail, I am enumerating the possibilities that should be looked into. Please discuss with your treating doctor. Unexplained aches and pains coming on and off in different parts of the body could be due to fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue syndrome, rheumatoid arthritis, lupus, Crohn’s disease, H pylori infection, anemia, liver disorders, diabetes, hypothyroidism, Vit B12 or Vit D deficiency and due to calcium or magnesium deficiency. It can also be due to sleep related disorders. In women it can be due to hormonal disturbances related to PCOD/menopause and in men it can be due to low testosterone. Severe anemia, and parathyroid gland disorders can also be the cause. Autoimmune disorders, multiple sclerosis and peripheral neuropathies due to diabetes, hypothyroidism, Lyme or lupus too should be investigated for. Since there was knee swelling Crohn’s and rheumatoid arthritis should be ruled out first. Do discuss this with your doctor.
